title: Zombie ga Kita kara Jinsei Mitsumenaoshita
overview: An outbreak of zombies in a local city! The only ones who can stand up to them are three women around 30 and their friends! In the midst of the battle, their hidden desires begin to seethe in strange ways! In this socially-conscious black comedy, Tomoya Sakurai, an up-and-coming playwright who sees "zombies" as a symbol of the dangers and anxieties of modern life, exposes the various problems of modern Japan.
